birth_place.en: Yangdu County, Langya Commandery, Eastern Han

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉丞相，杰出的政治家、军事家、发明家及散文家。
description.en: Chancellor of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period, an outstanding statesman, military strategist, inventor, and writer.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉开国皇帝。
description.en: Founding emperor of Shu Han.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉第二位、也是最后一位皇帝，刘备之子。
description.en: The second and last emperor of Shu Han, son of Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期的政权之一，由刘备建立。
description.en: One of the three major states that competed for supremacy over China in the Three Kingdoms period, founded by Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 古代中国最高行政官职。
description.en: The highest-ranking executive official in ancient China.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年权臣，曹魏政权的奠基者。
description.en: A warlord and the penultimate grand chancellor of the Eastern Han dynasty who rose to great power in the final years of the dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 孙吴政权的建立者，东吴开国皇帝。
description.en: Founder of the state of Eastern Wu during the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期的政权之一，由曹丕建立。
description.en: One of the three major states that competed for supremacy over China in the Three Kingdoms period, founded by Cao Pi.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期的政权之一，由孙权建立。
description.en: One of the three major states that competed for supremacy over China in the Three Kingdoms period, founded by Sun Quan.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮之父，东汉末年为泰山郡丞。
description.en: Father of Zhuge Liang, served as the assistant magistrate of Taishan Commandery during the late Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮之妻，名士黄承彦之女。
description.en: Wife of Zhuge Liang, daughter of the scholar Huang Chengyan.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年名士，诸葛亮岳父。
description.en: A scholar of the late Eastern Han dynasty, father-in-law of Zhuge Liang.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮之兄，仕于东吴。
description.en: Older brother of Zhuge Liang, served in Eastern Wu.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮之弟，仕于蜀汉。
description.en: Younger brother of Zhuge Liang, served in Shu Han.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮长子，蜀汉将领。
description.en: Eldest son of Zhuge Liang, a general of Shu Han.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛瑾次子，诸葛亮养子。
description.en: Second son of Zhuge Jin, adopted son of Zhuge Liang.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮叔父，曾在袁术和刘表麾下。
description.en: Uncle of Zhuge Liang, served under Yuan Shu and Liu Biao.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮好友，曾向刘备举荐诸葛亮。
description.en: Friend of Zhuge Liang, recommended Zhuge Liang to Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮好友。
description.en: Friend of Zhuge Liang.

description.zh-cn: 刘备重要谋士，与诸葛亮齐名，号称“凤雏”。
description.en: An important advisor to Liu Bei, as famous as Zhuge Liang, known as the 'Fledgling Phoenix'.

description.zh-cn: 刘备三次亲自拜访诸葛亮，请其出山辅佐的历史事件。
description.en: The historical event of Liu Bei visiting Zhuge Liang three times in person to ask for his assistance.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮在与刘备初次会面时提出的战略规划，为蜀汉政权的建立奠定了基础。
description.en: A strategic plan presented by Zhuge Liang to Liu Bei during their first meeting, which laid the foundation for the establishment of the Shu Han state.

description.zh-cn: 孙权、刘备联军在长江赤壁一带大破曹操大军的战役，是三国时期著名的以少胜多的战役。
description.en: A decisive naval battle in the winter of 208 at the end of the Han dynasty, where the allied forces of Sun Quan and Liu Bei decisively defeated the numerically superior forces of Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 刘备在夷陵之战失败后，于永安病危时将儿子刘禅托付给诸葛亮、李严等人的事件。
description.en: After his defeat at the Battle of Yiling, the dying Liu Bei entrusted his son Liu Shan to the care of Zhuge Liang and Li Yan.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉重臣，与诸葛亮同为刘备的托孤之臣。
description.en: A key official of Shu Han, co-regent with Zhuge Liang for Liu Shan.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮为平定南中地区的叛乱而发动的军事行动。
description.en: A military campaign launched by Zhuge Liang to pacify the rebellions in the Nanzhong region.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期南中地区的首领。
description.en: A local leader in the Nanzhong region during the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮为实现“兴复汉室，还于旧都”的目标而对曹魏发动的五次军事行动。
description.en: A series of five military campaigns launched by Zhuge Liang against the state of Cao Wei in order to restore the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮在第一次北伐前写给后主刘禅的奏章，表达了其忠诚和北伐的决心。
description.en: A memorial written by Zhuge Liang to Emperor Liu Shan before his first Northern Expedition, expressing his loyalty and determination.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉官员，因在街亭之战中失利而被诸葛亮处斩。
description.en: An official of Shu Han, executed by Zhuge Liang after his defeat at the Battle of Jieting.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏权臣，西晋的奠基人之一，诸葛亮北伐时的主要对手。
description.en: A key official of Cao Wei and a founder of the Jin dynasty, the primary adversary of Zhuge Liang during the Northern Expeditions.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏名将，在街亭之战大破马谡，后在追击蜀军时中埋伏身亡。
description.en: A renowned general of Cao Wei who defeated Ma Su at Jieting, later killed in an ambush while pursuing Shu forces.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉重臣，诸葛亮指定的继承人之一。
description.en: A key official of Shu Han, one of the successors designated by Zhuge Liang.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉重臣，诸葛亮指定的继承人之一。
description.en: A key official of Shu Han, one of the successors designated by Zhuge Liang.

description.zh-cn: 东汉时期地名，今山东省临沂市沂南县一带，诸葛亮出生地。
description.en: A place name during the Eastern Han dynasty, located in modern-day Yinan County, Linyi, Shandong. Birthplace of Zhuge Liang.

description.zh-cn: 位于今陕西省宝鸡市岐山县，诸葛亮最后一次北伐屯兵及病逝之处。
description.en: Located in modern-day Qishan County, Baoji, Shaanxi. The place where Zhuge Liang stationed his army during his final Northern Expedition and passed away.

description.zh-cn: 刘备三顾茅庐后，诸葛亮出山辅佐刘备，成为其核心幕僚。
description.en: After Liu Bei's three visits to his thatched cottage, Zhuge Liang left his seclusion to serve Liu Bei as his chief advisor.

description.zh-cn: 受刘备白帝城托孤，辅佐后主刘禅，总揽蜀汉军政大事。
description.en: Entrusted by Liu Bei at Baidicheng, he assisted Emperor Liu Shan, overseeing all military and political affairs of Shu Han.

description.zh-cn: 刘备于成都称帝，建立蜀汉政权。
description.en: Liu Bei proclaimed himself emperor in Chengdu, establishing the state of Shu Han.

description.zh-cn: 养子关系
description.en: Adoptive relationship

description.zh-cn: 亲生父子关系，后过继给诸葛亮。
description.en: Biological father-son relationship; later adopted by Zhuge Liang.

description.zh-cn: 二人为至交好友。
description.en: They were close friends.

description.zh-cn: 二人为至交好友。
description.en: They were close friends.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮向刘备陈述了三分天下的战略规划，即“草庐对”。
description.en: Zhuge Liang presented the strategic plan of dividing the empire into three to Liu Bei, known as the 'Longzhong Plan'.

description.zh-cn: 该战略成为刘备集团之后发展的基本方针。
description.en: This strategy became the fundamental guideline for the development of Liu Bei's faction.

description.zh-cn: 出使东吴，说服孙权联合抗曹，促成孙刘联盟。
description.en: He served as an envoy to Eastern Wu and persuaded Sun Quan to ally against Cao Cao, forming the Sun-Liu alliance.

description.zh-cn: 曹操在赤壁之战中大败，统一天下的意图受挫。
description.en: Cao Cao was decisively defeated at the Battle of Red Cliffs, thwarting his ambition to unify China.

description.zh-cn: 刘备病危时将刘禅托付给诸葛亮和李严。
description.en: When critically ill, Liu Bei entrusted his son Liu Shan to Zhuge Liang and Li Yan.

description.zh-cn: 为稳定后方，诸葛亮率军南下平定南中叛乱。
description.en: To stabilize the rear, Zhuge Liang led an army south to pacify the Nanzhong rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 孟获作为南中叛军首领被诸葛亮击败并降服。
description.en: As the leader of the Nanzhong rebels, Meng Huo was defeated and subdued by Zhuge Liang.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮为兴复汉室，五次率军北伐曹魏。
description.en: To restore the Han dynasty, Zhuge Liang led five military expeditions north against Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮在第一次北伐前上书刘禅，写下《出师表》。
description.en: Zhuge Liang wrote the 'Chu Shi Biao' as a memorial to Liu Shan before his first Northern Expedition.

description.zh-cn: 在后几次北伐中，诸葛亮与司马懿作为蜀魏双方主帅多次对峙。
description.en: In the later Northern Expeditions, Zhuge Liang and Sima Yi confronted each other multiple times as the commanders of the Shu and Wei armies.

description.zh-cn: 马谡因在街亭之战中处置失当，导致蜀军大败，使得第一次北伐失败。
description.en: Ma Su's mishandling of the Battle of Jieting led to a major defeat for the Shu army, causing the failure of the first Northern Expedition.

description.zh-cn: 因街亭之败，诸葛亮下令处斩马谡。
description.en: Due to the defeat at Jieting, Zhuge Liang ordered the execution of Ma Su.

description.zh-cn: 在第四次北伐撤退过程中，诸葛亮设伏射杀了追击的魏将张郃。
description.en: During the retreat of the fourth Northern Expedition, Zhuge Liang set an ambush and killed the pursuing Wei general Zhang He.

description.zh-cn: 第四次北伐时，李严负责督运粮草，因运粮不继而谎报军情，导致诸葛亮被迫撤军。
description.en: During the fourth Northern Expedition, Li Yan, responsible for grain transport, failed to supply the army and falsely reported military intelligence, forcing Zhuge Liang to retreat.

description.zh-cn: 事后查明真相，诸葛亮上表弹劾李严，将其废为平民，流放梓潼。
description.en: After discovering the truth, Zhuge Liang impeached Li Yan, had him stripped of his posts and titles, and exiled him to Zitong.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮临终前向后主刘禅推荐蒋琬作为自己的继承人。
description.en: On his deathbed, Zhuge Liang recommended Jiang Wan to Emperor Liu Shan as his successor.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮临终前在蒋琬之后，推荐费祎作为第二继承人。
description.en: On his deathbed, after Jiang Wan, Zhuge Liang recommended Fei Yi as the second successor.
